quotes.quote: Mindset is everything
If you want people to do something, make it easy
quotes.author: Richard Thaler

quotes.quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Comparison is the thief of joy
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: I can give you a six-word formula for success: Think things through, then follow through.
quotes.author: Captain Edward V. Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do, or do not, there is no try
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Wait for the right opportunity not the next available one
Sometimes you need to slow down to speed up
Great moments are born from great opportunities
If I had an hour to solve a problem I'd spend 55 minutes thinking about the problem and 5 minutes thinking about solutions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you do your best you might get outscored but you will never lose
Be yourself; everyone is already taken
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Never let a good crisis go to waste
quotes.author: Rahm Emanuel

quotes.quote: Pain is mandatory, suffering is optional
Our choices today affects our options tomorrow
Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom
A smooth sea never made a skillful mariner
A peaceful mind generates power
The happiness of our lives depends upon the quality of our thoughts
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Hard choices, easy life. Easy choices, hard life.
quotes.author: Jerzy Gregorek

quotes.quote: Success in anything is just a byproduct of learning, and learning is a byproduct of curiosity.
Ultimately, if you are curious about something, you will be successful at it, and the more curious you are about it, the more successful you will be at it.
quotes.author: Naval

quotes.quote: Nullius in verba (take nobody's word for it)
New goals don't deliver new results. New lifestyles do. And a lifestyle is a process, not an outcome. For this reason, your energy should go into building better habits, not chasing better results.
quotes.author: @JamesClear

quotes.quote: The plan won't give you the action, the action will give you the plan.
If you always do what you always did, you always get what you always got.
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Wants make you a servant
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Discomfort with uncertainty causes more anxiety than guaranteed bad news.
The praise from being right becomes the pain from being wrong.
quotes.author: Naval

quotes.quote: Leisure without study is death - a tomb for the living person.
quotes.author: Seneca
